description: Take a relaxing group bike ride to Schlosspark, exploring the beautiful parklands and surrounding areas of Münster.

locationInfo.description: A scenic bike route through Schlosspark, leading you through tree-lined paths and peaceful open spaces.
safetyTips: Check the bikes for functionality before starting.
Keep a safe distance from other cyclists.

description: Experience the serenity of Aasee on a stand-up paddleboard, perfect for a fun group activity in the summer sun.

locationInfo.description: Rent paddleboards at Aasee and explore the lake's calm waters with your group while enjoying the beautiful scenery.
safetyTips: Wear a life vest for safety.
Be mindful of your balance while paddling.
Ensure everyone knows how to paddle safely before setting out.

activity: Group Walk and Picnic at Burlo-Vardingholt Forest
description: Enjoy a peaceful group walk through Burlo-Vardingholt Forest followed by a relaxing picnic in the forest clearing.

locationInfo.description: A beautiful walk through the Burlo-Vardingholt Forest with shaded paths, ideal for group activities, and a perfect spot for a picnic afterwards.
safetyTips: Bring water and snacks for the walk.
Respect the forest environment and stay on marked trails.

description: Unwind with a group yoga session at Schlossgarten, offering a serene environment and scenic views to enhance your practice.

locationInfo.description: A peaceful park with plenty of open space, perfect for group yoga sessions surrounded by nature and historical architecture.
safetyTips: Bring a yoga mat or towel.
Stay mindful of your surroundings during the session.

description: Take a guided walking tour of Münster’s historic sites, including its medieval architecture and key landmarks, while learning about the city’s rich history.

locationInfo.description: A guided walking tour of Münster’s city center, where you’ll discover iconic historical buildings, including the Town Hall, St. Paul’s Cathedral, and more.
safetyTips: Bring a bottle of water to stay hydrated.
Stay together with the group and follow the guide’s instructions.
